mapper.insert: merge into cart_tbl c using dual on (c.mem_id = #{mem_id} and c.pdt_num_pk = #{pdt_num_pk}) when matched then update set c.cart_amount = c.cart_amount + #{cart_amount} when not matched then insert (cart_code, pdt_num_pk, mem_id, cart_amount) values(seq_cart.nextval, #{pdt_num_pk}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: select c.cart_code, c.pdt_num_pk, c.mem_id, c.cart_amount, p.pdt_img, p.pdt_name, p.pdt_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pdt_num_pk = p.pdt_num_pk and c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: update cart_tbl set cart_amount = #{cart_amount} where cart_code = #{cart_code}
